hero.alert: Built for teams crafting premium digital experiences
hero.title: Shape modular experiences with a minimalist foundation
hero.description: Meblock empowers you to design elegant interfaces and iterate rapidly. Craft every surface with clarity, polish, and a calm confidence that resonates.
hero.logoDescription: Intuitive blocks that adapt as your ambitions grow.

highlights.label: Modular workflows
highlights.value: Design, build, and launch in blocks.

features.title: A refined toolkit for timeless interfaces
features.description: Precisely crafted to help teams orchestrate modular experiences with clarity, while keeping every interaction calm, confident, and distinctly premium.

items.title: Composable building blocks
items.description: Snap together refined UI modules, then extend them without sacrificing brand polish or performance.

items.title: Adaptive theming
items.description: Switch effortlessly between light, dark, or bespoke palettes to maintain harmony across every surface.

items.title: Flow intelligence
items.description: Measure how every block performs, refine interactions, and launch improvements without full rebuilds.

cta.title: Launch your modular vision with effortless finesse
cta.description: Build immersive product stories, preview changes in real-time, and collaborate with confidence. Meblock aligns teams and keeps momentum serene.
